description: This file defines the interface ICompositionBuffer and its related nested interfaces for buffer management and plane access within the WPEFramework's Exchange namespace, likely used for hardware-accelerated rendering or composition buffers.

classes.name: ICompositionBuffer
classes.description: An interface that provides access to composition buffers, including methods for reference counting, plane access, and buffer metadata.

classes.name: ICompositionBuffer::IPlane
classes.description: Nested interface representing a single plane within a composition buffer, providing data accessor, stride, and offset information.

classes.name: ICompositionBuffer::IIterator
classes.description: Nested iterator interface for traversing the planes within a buffer.

methods.name: AddRef
methods.description: Increases the reference count for the buffer object.

methods.name: Release
methods.description: Decreases the reference count for the buffer object.

methods.name: Identifier
methods.description: Returns a unique identifier for the buffer.

methods.name: Planes
methods.description: Returns an iterator to access the planes of the buffer within a specified timeout.

methods.name: Completed
methods.description: Indicates that the caller is done with the planes, optionally marking the buffer as dirty.

methods.name: Render
methods.description: Marks the buffer for scanout or rendering.

methods.name: Width
methods.description: Returns the width of the buffer in pixels.

methods.name: Height
methods.description: Returns the height of the buffer in pixels.

methods.name: Format
methods.description: Returns the pixel format/layout of the buffer.

methods.name: Modifier
methods.description: Returns the modifier indicating pixel arrangement or format optimization for hardware.

methods.name: Type
methods.description: Returns the data type of the buffer (e.g., DMA, raw, invalid).
